content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, an angle <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in standard position, has a measure of <math alttext="theta equals pi over 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: ​​The slope of the terminal ray of the angle is <math alttext="1 half"><semantics><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​The slope of the terminal ray of the angle is <math alttext="fraction numerator 1 over denominator square root of 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​The slope of the terminal ray of the angle is <math alttext="fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The slope of the terminal ray of the angle is <math alttext="square root of 3"><semantics><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​The slope of the terminal ray of the angle is <math alttext="square root of 3"><semantics><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
